covenants.text: at the election of Administrative Borrower, 50% of the Applicable Margin portion of any interest payment that is due on a Term Loan in accordance with Sections 2.08(a) or (b) of this Agreement prior to the second anniversary of the Closing Date may be paid in kind (a "PIK Election")
covenants.intensity_rationale: 50% PIK toggle with 75bps step-up and 2-year time limit provides disciplined flexibility

covenants.text: prior to the second anniversary of the Closing Date may be paid in kind
covenants.intensity_rationale: 2-year protection period for PIK election provides moderate call protection

covenants.text: all Obligations of the Borrowers owing to such Non-Consenting Lender (including any Prepayment Premium) being replaced shall be paid in full
covenants.intensity_rationale: Prepayment premium referenced but specific terms not defined in visible text

covenants.text: Cash Dominion Event means (i) the occurrence of a Specified Event of Default or (ii) Availability being less than the greater of (1) $7,500,000 and (2) 12.5% of the Maximum Revolver Amount for a period of three (3) consecutive Business Days
covenants.intensity_rationale: Automatic trigger at $7.5M or 12.5% availability threshold with 3-day grace period
Financial performance covenant referenced but specific ratios not detailed in visible text
Restricted payments covenant present but specific limitations not detailed
Debt incurrence limitations present but specific tests not detailed

covenants.text: this Agreement may be amended (or amended and restated) with the written consent of the Required Lenders, the Administrative Agent, and the Borrowers (x) to add one or more additional credit facilities to this Agreement
covenants.intensity_rationale: Accordion facility available with Required Lender consent but no specific size limits mentioned

covenants.text: The Required Lenders may, or, with the consent of the Required Lenders or the Administrative Agent, as applicable, may, from time to time, (a) enter into with the relevant Credit Party or Credit Parties written amendments
covenants.intensity_rationale: Standard Required Lender threshold for amendments and waivers

covenants.text: During such two (2) Business Day period, Revolving Agent will, if requested, discuss any such new or modified Reserve with Administrative Borrower
covenants.intensity_rationale: 2-day notice period for reserve establishment with automatic borrowing restrictions

covenants.text: Financial Information, Reports, Notices and Information
covenants.intensity_rationale: Comprehensive reporting requirements but specific frequency not detailed in visible text

covenants.text: Change of Control shall mean an event or series of events by which: (a) any Person or group shall acquire ownership, directly or indirectly, beneficially or of record, of Capital Stock of Administrative Borrower representing more than fifty percent (50%) of the aggregate ordinary voting power
covenants.intensity_rationale: 50% change of control threshold defined but specific put provisions not detailed
Mandatory prepayment provisions present but specific triggers not detailed in visible text
Events of default provisions present but specific cross-default terms not detailed

covenants.text: On one occasion exercised within 30 days of a Purchase Option Trigger Event, the Term Lenders shall have the option, but not the obligation, to (x) purchase from the Revolving Lenders all, but not less than all, of the Revolving Loans
covenants.intensity_rationale: 30-day purchase option for Term Lenders provides moderate exit control
